headline: Big New Expansion at Ford’s Louisville Plant Sends Ford Motor Company (F) Stock Jumping
summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) is one of the 8 Biggest EV Stocks to Watch in 2025. A significant 52,000-square-foot expansion at Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F)’s Louisville Assembly Plant (LAP) in Kentucky has been proposed as part of the $1.2 billion EV transition investment included in the 2023 UAW-Ford labor contract. The proposals call for a 30,000-square-foot […]
